org.arl.fjage

Class TickerBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Behavior
      • org.arl.fjage.TickerBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Behavior>

    public class TickerBehavior
extends Behavior
    A behavior that is executed every specified period. The onTick() method of this behavior is called at intervals defined by the period.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.arl.fjage.Behavior

        action, agent, log

      void action()
      This method calls onTick() once every specified period.

      Creates a new TickerBehavior which runs the specified Runnable every specified period.
      boolean done()
      Returns true once stop() is called, false otherwise.

      This method should return a number that denotes the priority of a behavior.

        public void onTick()

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Description copied from class: Behavior
        This method should return a number that denotes the priority of a behavior. By default, the priority is 0. Behaviors with lower priority values are executed before behaviors with higher priority values.
        Overrides:
        getPriority in class Behavior
        Returns:
        priority value
